fields.name: key
projectId
fields.doc: Project identifier. Null if unknown or the user is not enrolled in a project.

fields.name: userId
fields.doc: User Identifier created during the enrolment.

fields.name: sourceId
fields.doc: Unique identifier associated with the source.
Key of a Kafka SinkRecord

fields.name: value

type.name: ThincItCodeBreaker
type.doc: THINC-it Assessment derived from Digit Symbol Substitution Test. As many trials as can be completed within 2 minutes. Each trial is a symbol/number to be matched.

fields.name: time
fields.doc: Timestamp in UTC (s) when the test is submitted to the subject.

fields.name: timeCompleted
fields.doc: Timestamp in UTC (s) when the subject completes the test.

fields.name: score
fields.doc: THINC-it index score - 0 to 4000.

fields.name: completed
fields.doc: The number of completed trials.

fields.name: incorrect
fields.doc: The number of incorrect responses.

fields.name: longestTrial
fields.doc: Longest trial completion time expressed in milliseconds.

fields.name: iqrCompletion
fields.doc: Mean of trial completion times within interquartile range.

fields.name: inputType

type.name: ThincItInputType
type.doc: Possible input type that a subject can use to do an assignment.

fields.doc: Dominant input type used by the subject to answer.

fields.name: quarterSummaryOne
longestTrial
fields.doc: Longest trial completion time expressed in milliseconds.

fields.name: meanTime
fields.doc: Mean trial completion time expressed in milliseconds.

fields.name: incorrect
fields.doc: The number of incorrect responses.

fields.name: inputType
fields.doc: Dominant input type used by the subject to answer.
Trial summary for CodeBreaker assessment Quarter 1.

fields.name: quarterSummaryTwo
fields.doc: Trial summary for CodeBreaker assessment Quarter 2.

fields.name: quarterSummaryThree
fields.doc: Trial summary for CodeBreaker assessment Quarter 3.

fields.name: quarterSummaryFour
fields.doc: Trial summary for CodeBreaker assessment Quarter 4.

fields.name: appVersion
fields.doc: App version.
Value of a Kafka SinkRecord
